titleStmt.title: A Further account of the proceedings against the rebels in the west of England, who on the 10th of September, 1685, to the number of two-hundred fifty one, received sentence of death at Dorchester for high-treason ...

notesStmt.note: "This may be printed; R.L.S., September the 17th, 1685."
Contains lists of names of those sentenced to death for high treason.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
